tagline: Grows client relationships through proactive value delivery and strategic account expansion
pros: Proactive churn risk detection before clients even complain
Quarterly business reviews that reinforce partnership value
Expansion revenue from genuine problem-solving, not pushy upselling
Relationship depth that creates client loyalty and referrals
cons: Time-intensive relationship management limits portfolio size
Advocacy for clients can create tension with product priorities
Less effective with purely transactional, low-touch accounts

model_recommendations.notes: Prioritizes voice, tone, and creative quality over analytical depth. Thinking/reasoning can hurt creative output — keep low or off.
